themes: Mismatch between city requirements and organizational capacity
Burden of DEI requirements on underserved organizations
Lack of city-provided ADA accessibility in facilities
Perceived hypocrisy or double standard in city expectations
Call for realistic and attainable requirements
key_phrases: requirements and desires from the city are not feasible
a ton of boxes to check for DEI
most underserved organizations don’t even have the bandwidth
city facilities lack substantial ADA accessibility
get on the level of what’s actually possible and attainable
barriers_identified: Inadequate ADA accessibility in city facilities
solutions_proposed: Align city requirements with what is possible and attainable for most organizations
Ensure city facilities meet the same accessibility standards required of applicants
